name: toona
description: Toona is a meme coin on the Fantom blockchain, bringing laughter and creativity to the crypto space. It’s a lighthearted token that focuses on fun, art, and building a strong, engaged community. Backed by the speed and low fees of Fantom, Toona makes transactions simple and hassle-free. The project is powered by its community, with exciting content, memes, and art at its core. Whether you’re here for the fun or to be part of a growing movement, Toona welcomes everyone.
